record.description: Builds and deploys a single-page React application using S3 and (if specified) Route53

name.description: The name of the bucket. If not present auto-generation will be attempted.

s3_bucket.description: Whether to enable versioning on the bucket

base_domain.description: If true, puts the full public access block

public_access_block.description: Set this to configure the public access block on an item-by-item level

bucket_policy.description: An inline IAM policy to attach to the S3 bucket. Your bucket should be in the Resource section of the policy

CORS.description: If set to true, attaches permissive CORS to the bucket. If set to an object, should have a single key 'CORSRules' with the value being a list of CORS rules

tags.description: The tags to attach to this bucket

index_document.description: The path to the index document for your static website

error_document.description: The path that handles 4XX class errors. Can be the same as the index_document

redirect_to.description: If you want to redirect all requests, this is where S3 will redirect requests to. Otherwise do not provide

redirect_protocol.description: If you want to redirect all requests, this is the protocol it redirects with

routing_rules.description: See https://docs.aws.amazon.com/AmazonS3/latest/userguide/how-to-page-redirect.html#advanced-conditional-redirects to see how to write advanced redirect rules

domain.description: The full domain for the record

hosted_zone_id.description: The ID of the hosted zone that this record lies in
